M11=0005
M12=0010
I11=0010
I1=0000
M4=0001
R2=0002
R3=0003
R4=0001
CALL(M11,I11)
CALL(M11,I11)
CALL(M12,I11)
IDLE
NOP
FINISH

.CALL(0015)
R2=R2+R3
RTS

.CALL(0020)
R2=R2-R4
DM(I1,M4)=R2
IF NE JUMP(M12,I11)
RTS

.MEMCHECK
0000 0007
0001 0006
0002 0005
0003 0004
0004 0003
0005 0002
0006 0001
0007 0000
